nodes.label: Anduril Industries
nodes.description: Private U.S. defense technology company (founded 2017) developing autonomous systems and AI-enabled defense platforms.

nodes.label: Founders & Early Owners
nodes.description: Founders and early employees hold a significant ownership stake as Anduril is a privately held company.

nodes.label: Palmer Luckey
nodes.description: Co-founder of Anduril; previously founded Oculus VR. One of the major individual owners of the company.

nodes.label: Trae Stephens
nodes.description: Co-founder and chairman; also a partner at Founders Fund, which seeded and has repeatedly backed Anduril.

nodes.label: Brian Schimpf
nodes.description: Co-founder and CEO; former Palantir executive, holds equity as a key founder and leader.

nodes.label: Matt Grimm
nodes.description: Co-founder and COO; early Anduril executive with an ownership stake.

nodes.label: Joe Chen
nodes.description: Co-founder; part of the founding team holding equity in the company.

nodes.label: Founders Fund
nodes.description: Venture capital firm led by Peter Thiel; seeded Anduril and led multiple large rounds, including a recent multi-billion-dollar raise.

nodes.label: Andreessen Horowitz (a16z)
nodes.description: Major Silicon Valley VC investor in Anduril’s early and growth funding rounds.

nodes.label: General Catalyst
nodes.description: Venture firm and repeat investor in Anduril’s growth funding.

nodes.label: Lux Capital
nodes.description: Deep-tech focused VC; part of Anduril’s significant funding rounds.

nodes.label: 8VC
nodes.description: Venture firm backing Anduril’s early and mid-stage rounds, focused on frontier technology.

nodes.label: Valor Equity Partners
nodes.description: Growth equity investor that has led or participated in large Anduril rounds, including a major Series E raise.

nodes.label: D1 Capital Partners
nodes.description: Hedge fund / crossover investor participating in later Anduril funding rounds.

nodes.label: Sands Capital
nodes.description: Investor that co-led a large Anduril round, backing its expansion as a major defense contractor.

nodes.label: Fidelity Management
nodes.description: Institutional investor (through Fidelity funds) involved in late-stage Anduril financing.

nodes.label: Counterpoint Global
nodes.description: Morgan Stanley Counterpoint Global; institutional investor in Anduril’s large funding rounds.

nodes.label: Baillie Gifford
nodes.description: Long-term public and private markets investor with exposure to Anduril as a late-stage growth company.

nodes.label: Altimeter Capital
nodes.description: Technology-focused investment firm participating in Anduril’s high-valuation rounds.

nodes.label: 1789 Capital & Others
nodes.description: Newer and smaller funds such as 1789 Capital and various institutional investors that hold minority stakes.

nodes.label: Employees & Management
nodes.description: Anduril employees and leadership beyond the founders who hold stock or options as part of a private-company ownership structure.

nodes.label: Peter Thiel
nodes.description: Co-founder of Founders Fund; influential Anduril backer through the fund, not publicly listed as a direct majority owner.

nodes.label: Government & Defense Customers
nodes.description: U.S. Department of Defense and allied government agencies are major customers via contracts, but are not equity owners.
